name: Carter
descriptions: Carter is a Powder Ganger in the Mojave Wasteland in 2281.

Carter was locked away at the NCR Correctional Facility after being framed over an undisclosed amount of caps by a pit boss while working in a casino in New Reno. During his time imprisoned, he was always known as the guy who could get things. This led to his career as a trader after the Powder Gangers took over the facility.

topics.response_text: {Prison under attack}I don't want to get shot!

topics.topic_text: Show me what you have for sale.
topics.response_text: If I don't have anything you like, well... tough. I don't do special orders.
I was always the guy who could get things, if you know what I mean. Figured I might as well keep on doing it.

topics.topic_text: What did you do to end up here in the first place?
topics.response_text: I worked in a casino in New Reno, and one of the pit bosses decided he didn't like me. Framed me over some caps, and I ended up in here.

topics.topic_text: What can you tell me about this place?
topics.response_text: This is where the NCR sent prisoners to "reform" through hard labor. I never saw much reforming around here, myself.
Don't have any other place to go. I'd just end up back in another prison, or dead out in the wasteland.
